question: I had a question regarding a few dreams that I have had.
answer:
QUESTION
I have had many dreams regarding the same subject matter. In my dream it is either my mother or sister either giving birth to a baby, or have given birth to a baby boy. Another reoccuring dream i have is myself using the bathroom. I see myself sitting on the toilet, urinating, or passing stool, or both. I would really appreciate it if you could tell me if there is any meaning to this dream. Thank you.
ANSWER


Share:
1. Generally, giving birth is a sign of peace and happiness.
2. Passing stool, etc. could mean impure wealth, earning, etc. or cure from
any sickness.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
